title: Heaven
prayerPoints: Thank God for the hope of heaven
Ask for strength to live for eternity
Pray for those who need to know eternal hope

Introduction.question: What are you most looking forward to in the new creation?
Introduction.answer: Guide discussion about the hope of the new creation.

Introduction.question: How does the hope of heaven impact your daily life?
Introduction.answer: Explain how eternal perspective impacts daily life.

Introduction.question: What does it mean that God will dwell with His people?
Introduction.answer: Discuss the significance of God dwelling with His people.

Revelation 21:1-22:5.question: How does this passage describe the new creation?
Revelation 21:1-22:5.answer: Explain the characteristics of the new creation.

Revelation 21:1-22:5.question: What significance do you see in the new Jerusalem?
Revelation 21:1-22:5.answer: Discuss the symbolism of the new Jerusalem.

Revelation 21:1-22:5.question: How does this passage show the fulfillment of all God's promises?
Revelation 21:1-22:5.answer: Highlight how God's promises are fulfilled.

Revelation 21:1-22:5.question: What does it mean that there will be no more death or pain?
Revelation 21:1-22:5.answer: Emphasize the end of suffering and death.

Revelation 21:1-22:5.question: How does this passage point to our eternal hope?
Revelation 21:1-22:5.answer: Point to the eternal hope we have in Christ.

Application.question: How can you live now in light of the new creation to come?
Application.answer: Suggest practical ways to live with eternal perspective.

Application.question: What specific ways can you demonstrate heavenly values today?
Application.answer: Help identify areas needing hope and transformation.

Application.question: How can you cultivate deeper longing for God's presence?
Application.answer: Discuss strategies for maintaining hope in trials.

Application.question: What steps can you take to build eternal community now?
Application.answer: Encourage growth in godliness and eternal values.

Application.question: How can you help others see the hope of the new creation?
Application.answer: Share strategies for explaining the hope of new creation.
